instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> shutsdown near the end of loading OS
threads.message:
Board had corrosion under <CHIP>U3540</CHIP> and <CHIP>U7870</CHIP> that got fixed fine, now board turns on, while loading the OS the bar gets to about 80% then disappears a few seconds later image is gone and board stays at around 0.100a for about 10 seconds then board shuts down.

I have tried clean ME BIOS, ultrasonic board  but no luck.

Thanks in advanced for help!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> shutsdown near the end of loading OS
threads.message: Can you start in safe mode?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> shutsdown near the end of loading OS
threads.message: Ive tried with 2 different SSD and OS, but I will try safe mode now.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> shutsdown near the end of loading OS
threads.message: Just tested in safe mode and it boots up but it shut down on the first try.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> shutsdown near the end of loading OS
threads.message:
So you can get logged in to macOS in safe mode, but turns off in short time?
Or turns off only when you try to access any application?

Try without airport card connected too.
